import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; export const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", linkedin: "", youtube: "", instagram: "", }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
